item.title: Reversing WiFi QuickConfig for an IP Cam
item.description: The Camera I recently came across a really good deal on a WiFi Video Doorbell being cleared out by AusPost for AU$29 a pop (specifically, the Q-See QDB03-AU). The unit comes packaged with a pair of 18650 Lithium-ion batteries that are claimed to provide up to 6 months standby and has a list of features that include 2-way talk, PIR motion sensing and local SD card recording (card not included).
